issues.description: Return type mismatch for getTotalNumberOfStudents: the UML diagram in the problem statement specifies a return type of String, but the solution implements it as int. Students following the UML will declare a method returning String, leading to signature mismatches with the reference implementation and likely test failures.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the UML diagram in the problem statement to specify getTotalNumberOfStudents(): int instead of String so it matches the intended implementation.
